70851.「……水温よし。\n しびれくらげの姿も……見えないな。:
...water temperature is good. No Man o' War in
sight....

70852.「ムーロンさん。問題なさそうっス！: Mr. Muron. Looks like we're good to go!

70853.「今年も このときが来ちまったか。\n スリルとロマンスの 夏 本番……。:
It's that time of year again. The summer of
thrills and romance is in full swing...

70855.「よぉーっし！ お前たち！\n お待ちかね 海開きの時間だぞぉっ！:
Yo, guys! Hey you guys! You've been waiting
for me. It's time to open the sea!

71177.「コイツはな この船とともに沈んだ\n 仲間たちの遺品なんだ。:
This is a relic of my companions who went down
with this ship.

71178.「あれはもう……\n 今から ５００年ほど前のことだ。: That was already... about 500 years ago now.

71179.「アストルティアに 未曾有の災厄が訪れた。\n ……いつわりの太陽が 地表を焦が:
An unprecedented calamity has come to Astoltia. The sun of the ages scorched the earth's surface and burned its inhabitants one
by one.

71180.「オレたちは 人々の混乱に乗じて宝を盗みだし\n この船に たんまり載せて 逃げ:
We took advantage of the people's confusion, stole the treasure, loaded it onto this boat, and went on the run. Waiting for the sun to go
down.

71181.「だが……食料を調達するために\n 立ち寄った島で オレの運命は変わった。:
But... my fate changed when I stopped at an
island to get some food.

71182.「オレは 島に住む者たちを集めて\n ありったけの食いもんを出せと 命じたんだ。:
I gathered the islanders and ordered them to
bring out all the food they could find. I put
my sword so close to their throats.

71183.「だが あいつらは そんな脅しに動じなかった。\n それどころか 極悪非道のデュ:
But they were unmoved by such threats. On the
contrary, they grabbed the diabolical Durak
pirates and said

71184.「神さまが 迎えに来てくれた……。\n この人たちが 私たちを 安らぎの地へ\n:
God has come to welcome us... these people
will lead us to a place of peace...

71185.「……あの いつわりの太陽のせいで\n この世界は 狂っちまったんだ。:
The world has gone mad because of that
everlasting sun.

71186.「略奪に来た海賊を まさかの神さま扱い……。\n そんな異様な光景を 目の当たり:
I guess I must have gone crazy myself after
witnessing such a bizarre scene...

71187.「胸に 熱い想いが たぎってきてなぁ。\n 気がついたら ヤツらを船に乗せていた:
I had a burning feeling in my heart. I found myself putting them on the boat. I had to abandon my precious treasure so that they
could all come aboard.

71188.「その後も行く先々で 宝を捨てては 苦しんでる\n 人たちを船に乗せたよ。捨てる:
After that, wherever we went, we'd throw away our treasure and take the afflicted aboard our boat. When there was no more treasure to throw
away, the crew would dump their cargo and lighten the ship.

71189.「だが 救いを求める人々は あとを絶たず\n ついに この船にも限界が来た。\n:
But the people seeking help kept coming, and
finally the ship had reached its limit. If we
take on any more people, the ship will sink...

71190.「そのときだ……。肌身離さず持っていた\n 大切なお守りを みんなが 捨てはじめ:
That's when everyone started throwing away their precious amulets they carried around with them. They wanted to lighten the ship as
much as possible...

71191.「みんなで 安らぎの地に たどり着く……。\n その心の支えにしてた お守りまで:
They're all trying to reach a place of peace... and they even threw away the amulet that was supporting their hearts... what a
bunch of idiots they are.

71192.「船長として 今のオレが やるべきこと……。\n それは この地に縛られている:
As captain, what I must do now... is to return hope to my companions who are bound to this land, and show them a new course. I'm going to
do it.

71193.「ほら お前たちの希望を返すよ。\n もう二度と 手放すんじゃねえぞ。:
Here. I'm giving you back your hope. Don't
ever give it away again.

71194.「みんな……今度こそ\n 安らぎの地へ行くんだぜ……。:
Guys... this time we're going to a place of
peace...

71195.「さてと……しめっぽいのは おしめえだ。\n 長話に 付き合わせちまって 悪かっ:
Well...that's it for the cliches. I'm sorry
for putting you through such a long story.
Now, please accept my gratitude.

71196.「……こんなボロボロの姿になっても\n オレは この船の船長だ。\n ここに残っ:
...I may look like this, but I'm still the
captain of this ship. I have to stay here with
you.

71198.「この夏 最大の青春が\n 大グチ開けて 待ってるってなぁ！:
The greatest youth of this summer is waiting
for you with its big mouth open!
